website_summaries.verdict: These simple pinch guards earn high praise for their sturdy construction and can be attached at multiple points on most doors.
pros: Flexible EVA foam doesn't lose its shape in a hurry
Can be installed on the side or top of doors and some users even managed to successfully place them on hinges
cons: There's always a chance of losing one in between use

customer_reviews.title: These work great. A couple have split
customer_reviews.text: These work great. A couple have split, but still work. Works best if you just hang over the hinge. Then they wouldn’t split. I took another reviewer suggestion and put on the inside of the door so my little ones could smash fingers. It works, but is hard to get on and off, thus splitting the thingy. My brother hung it over the top hinge and it worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Dr1

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping doors from closing!
customer_reviews.text: I use these on doors, not for kids, but for cats. One of our cats seems to constantly close doors and will either lock himself or one of the other cats in the bathroom or bedroom. These work perfectly yo keep the doors from closing. They seem to be very durable as we’ve had them for some time now with no wear or problems at all. Also love that they store easily on the doorknob when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Bill A

customer_reviews.title: Prevents smashed fingers
customer_reviews.text: These are great! My one year-old son has a fascination with opening and closing doors. I got frustrated having to watch the door the entire time to make sure he didn’t smash his fingers, so I bought these. They fit snug on the door, so I don’t have to worry about them falling off. I put them up high enough where he can’t reach them, and they have solved our problem. They are the easiest to take on and off, so when you do actually want to close the door you can remove it and slip it over the door handle.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay B.

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as expected and super easy.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter locked herself in the playroom and to prevent that happening again we bought this product. We put it on the top corner of the door, opposite the hinges. Door can close most of the way but not all the way. Works exactly as expected and super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: No more door slamming! Got these for my young daughters (6 and 9) who slam doors...esp. when they are upset about something. These foam stoppers are easy to use and very sturdy. Couldn't be happier with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Made of high density rubber
customer_reviews.text: Made of high density rubber foam and slide over the end of the door with good grip on smooth paint. Provide a good one inch gap between the door and the jamb to protect those tiny fingers. You can locate then anywhere on the door edge and I would recommend mounting them above the toddler's reach. The Guards pull right off if you need to actually close a door and they are small enough not to take up much space on a shelf. They are so simple effective and easy to use that I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: willard jones

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price
customer_reviews.text: Great price and great product. I love having the extras since sometimes my husband misplaces them now I have a few to spare and they have saved a lot of finger slams
customer_reviews.author: B.ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: These were much more sturdy than I expected after all the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: McGuire SITE

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: this foam is sturdier then other door stoppers I've used. Feels like it can survive longer, hold onto the door well. and It's a nice 6 pack!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff & Beth

customer_reviews.title: If you have kids this item is a must!
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact these foam door stoppers are not cute and they tend to blend in with our white doors. They are super easy to install. It took only a minute or two to install of them onto our doors. They seem to be well made and they have prevented our son from hurting himself.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Kim

customer_reviews.title: Simple
customer_reviews.text: Simple, great does the job. My cat found one and sunk her teeth in but it is still intact!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, does not tear like others.
customer_reviews.text: A nice quality foam, does not tear or split like others.
customer_reviews.author: htgrimmi

customer_reviews.title: These are a great fix for doors that you want to keep opened ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a great fix for doors that you want to keep opened and not fully closed. My twin boys run amuck and they are a handful. I would recommend this out of any of the baby safety products.
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: Best idea ever
customer_reviews.text: These work great and are so easy to put on any door! Keeps my son from shutting the door on his hands and keeping us out!
customer_reviews.author: Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Cool idea and simple to use very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I mean what a cool idea that is so simple and works so well. Having small kids and animals thee door guard work great. So easy to install and super fast. They work like a dream and doors will not shut on kids or cats. Very happy with how fast it shipped. GREAT PRoduct

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase EVER
customer_reviews.text: Got my sanity back! No longer do I have to listen to my 2yr old slam doors all day long. Best purchase EVER!

customer_reviews.title: The size is perfect for any doors
customer_reviews.text: These work fabulously! I've tried numerous door stoppers to try to get my son from shutting doors constantly and none have worked. They've all been too small, or easily pulled out and these are the right size.

customer_reviews.text: I can be at ease with the door stoppers my son has smashed his fingers in multiple time this year alone and decided I have to buy something to prevent future injuries. This is an excellent solution!

product_meta.title: (6 Pack) White Child Safety Foam Door Stoppers Finger Pinch Guard for Baby
product_meta.description: As parents we know that baby and child proofing is important in ensuring the safety and well-being of our little ones. Small children, toddlers and crawling babies love to explore and their curiosity often lead them to objects, places, and rooms where they can get hurt. The doors in our homes are one of those objects that children often navigate to. A door that is allowed to close freely can cause painful finger pinch injuries and the force and weight of a door accidentally slamming shut can result in considerable damage to your child's small and delicate hands. - Avoiding painful finger pinch and jamming injuries - Stopping the door from slamming shut - Preventing children and pets from accidentally getting locked in room. Features: - Made from safe, non-toxic and environmentally friendly EVA foam - Soft and flexible C shape fits easily around any door - High quality and durable so it won't lose its form over time and slip off door - Conveniently store hanging around door knob or door handle when not in use - White color and simple design will blend into any décor style. To Install: OPTION 1: Place the Finger Pinch Guard around the outer edge of the door that's high enough up to be out of reach for children OPTION 2: Place the Finger Pinch Guard around the top of the door at least 6 inches from the outer edge. It is time to stop those slamming doors, accidental lock-ins, and painful finger injuries. Our customers love the door guard because it is a simple, effective, and high quality product that is easy to use. Lock in this limited time special price by buying yours TODAY!
feature_bullets: Made from soft EVA foam and is perfect for protecting the little hands and fingers of your baby, toddler, or child from getting pinched or jammed due to a door closing.

Makes it easy to attach and it fits around any size door. Because of the tight fit the door stop will not fall or slide off and therefore will prevent your child from accidentally getting locked inside a room. Similarly, pets can roam freely without getting stuck in a room because of a door closing behind them.
Provides a soft cushion between the door and door frame. This prevents the door from slamming shut due to a breeze coming from an open window or a draft caused by an air conditioner.

Simply place the Finger Pinch Guard on the outer edge of the door and that’s high enough up to be out of reach for children. Alternatively, you can place the Finger Pinch Guard on the top of the door at least 6 inches from the outer edge. When not in use simply hang around the door know or door handle.
